summary: Encapsulates multiple descriptor matching strategies (nearest‑neighbor, symmetric NN, mutual NN, symmetric mutual NN) into a single module, letting users choose the matching mode and set a distance‑ratio threshold, and provides a forward operation that applies the selected matcher to descriptor tensors.
business_intent: Provides a flexible, reusable component for extracting feature correspondences in computer‑vision pipelines—such as image registration, stitching, and object recognition—by offering configurable descriptor matching that can be integrated into deep‑learning workflows.
